column4: hello, i need libmp3lame.so for audacity. where can i get this file+
i couldn't find the file in synaptic. do you still think i can apt-get it?
i already have gstreamer on my pc.
but i only want to getlibmp3lame.soand nothing else.
i just checked my synaptic. I found out that i already have gstreamer0.8-lame
i have just installed lame. what's the next step to get audacity saving to mp3?
it still asks for the location of libmp3lame.so
do you know how to search files in ubuntu?
i found two files with similar names in my /usr/lib/. one is libmp3lame.so.0.0.0 (309kb), the other is libmp3lame.so.0 (19 bytes, link)
